original_text: This is how you are to treat all the cities that are at a distance from you and do not belong to the nations nearby.
korean_text: 네가 네게서 멀리 떠난 성읍들 곧 이 민족들에게 속하지 아니한 성읍들에게는 이같이 행하려니와

sentences.original_text: This is how you are to treat all the cities
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너희가 모든 성을 대우해야 할 방식이다

sentences.original_text: that are at a distance from you
and do not belong to the nations nearby
